TopicTitle: My take on a heavy rover

Articles.Content:
This is my new heavy rover it seats 3 kerbals at a time as well it is equipped with mechjeb 2 (other then that no mods used in making this)

It is pretty heavy duty has front lights and has a prob core for remote control. It also comes equipped with a self righting system for the inevitable roll over at high speeds.

anotehr shot of it on the mun

And the link to the .craft file note that it is just the rover no launch/landing system although it is balanced so landing it should not be a problem
